main.java.vlashchevskyi.exam.concurrency

Class PoolExecutor<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.vlashchevskyi.exam.concurrency.PoolExecutor<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PoolCaller, PoolRunner

    public abstract class PoolExecutor<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    PoolExecutor is abstract class provides methods to create and configure a thread pool.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService pool
      The pool to run tasks.
      protected java.util.List<T> tasks
      The collection of tasks to run with pool.
      protected java.lang.Class<T> taskType
      The class of task that will be used to construct its instance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PoolExecutor()
      Constructs a child instance.
      PoolExecutor(int size)
      Constructs a child instance and initialize pool with defined size.
